summary: Frontend testing completed for Corporate Philosophy and History page redesign. All pages render correctly with all required data-testid elements present. Navigation works via Corporate Identity dropdown.
passed_tests: Homepage (/) loads correctly with hero section
Corporate Overview page (/corporate/overview) renders with all 4 stat cards

Corporate Philosophy page (/corporate/philosophy) renders correctly with: hero section, title (data-testid='philosophy-title'), tagline bar (data-testid='philosophy-tagline'), intro paragraph (data-testid='philosophy-intro'), Quality section (data-testid='core-value-quality'), Innovation section (data-testid='core-value-innovation'), Sustainability section (data-testid='core-value-sustainability'), and bottom CTA

Corporate History page (/corporate/history) renders correctly with: hero section, title (data-testid='history-title'), horizontal timeline (data-testid='journey-timeline') with 5 milestones (1970, 1989, 1991, 2024, Today), shareholder section (data-testid='shareholder-section') with heading and diagram showing 4 companies (Yamato 45%, SYS 35%, Hanwa 15%, GRP 5%), 4 shareholder detail cards (data-testid='shareholder-card-0' through 'shareholder-card-3')
Navigation via Corporate Identity dropdown works: Overview, Philosophy, History & Group Structure links all navigate correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Corporate Philosophy page components are in /app/frontend/src/pages/CorporatePhilosophy.jsx and /app/frontend/src/pages/PhilosophySections.jsx. Corporate History page components are in /app/frontend/src/pages/CorporateHistory.jsx, /app/frontend/src/pages/HistoryTimeline.jsx, and /app/frontend/src/pages/HistoryShareholder.jsx. All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes. The pages were split into smaller files to avoid babel build errors.
